description: This C# source file defines the NoteRepository class implementing the INoteRepository interface, providing CRUD operations for notes using Entity Framework Core with an AppDbContext.

classes.name: NoteRepository
classes.description: Repository class implementing data access for notes using Entity Framework Core.

methods.name: GetAllAsync
methods.description: Retrieves all notes ordered by last updated time asynchronously.

methods.name: GetByIdAsync
methods.description: Retrieves a note by its unique identifier asynchronously.

methods.name: AddAsync
methods.description: Adds a new note to the database asynchronously.

methods.name: DeleteAsync
methods.description: Deletes a note by its ID asynchronously, returns true if successful.

methods.name: ExistsAsync
methods.description: Checks if a note with the specified ID exists asynchronously.
